about_the_game:
Combat Cat is a fast-paced, side-scrolling, bullet hell where you fight against an endless horde of angry slimes
as a combat ready cat!

Shoot, dash and fly your way around the areas as slimes try to stop your journey!

After each level the slimes grow in power, but so do you! Upgrade your weapon and cat with the thirty unique items
the slimes drop along the way! Use these items for infinite customizability options! Homing shotgun? Super powered
sniper? The choice is yours!

Face off against four diverse slime types and three different challenging bosses as your journey progresses!
If you're ready for a real fight try a higher difficulty or maybe even the truly chaotic slime rain mode!
Or have fun and experiment in the creative mode to build the combat cat of your dreams!

Go on now! Create your Combat Cat and survive as long as you can!



  • Jump, Dash, and fly around the arena!
  • Upgrade your weapon and cat for infinite combat options!
  • Different game modes including creative mode for experimenting and slime rain for maximum chaos!
  • Ending Stats screen to see how far you have come!
  • Four slime types and three different bosses!



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 700 Series
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 45 MB available space

short_description: A fast-paced, side-scrolling, bullet hell with an inventory system where a player can upgrade their weapons and player stats to survive as long as possible.
